name: Murphy's Pub
heroHeadline: Pull up a stool. You're among friends.
heroTagline: Serving Cork's finest pints and proper craic since 1852.
description: A family-owned Cork institution serving proper pints, hearty food, and genuine craic for over 170 years.
story: Six generations of Murphys have poured pints behind this bar. What started as Seán Murphy's dream in 1852 has become a Cork institution—where locals bring visitors, where celebrations happen, and where you're never just a customer.
heritage: Still family-owned. Still pouring the same stout.
